A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sad. I'm a huge fan of Star Wars since forever. The Force Awakens was somehow a disappointement\, but at least it was not bad. The Last Jedi is one of the most WORST MOVIE EVER. It was not only a bad Star Wars movie\, it was also a bad science-fiction movie\, a bad fantasy movie\, bad action movie... Bad scenario\, bad characters (yes\, Rian Johnson managed to all of them. i mean\, even Luke and Leia!!! -Kylo Ren was better on this one\, strangely-)\, some illogical sequence of events... I was almost crying in the theater\, because I was so shocked at how much a joke was this movie. A Star Wars movie! Can't believe it. I'm pissed.
